com.magnet.android.mms.async

Class StateChangedHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magnet.android.mms.async.StateChangedHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateChangedListener

    public abstract class StateChangedHandler
extends Object
implements StateChangedListener
    A default handler with a context used as a callback from an asynchronous call. The caller must override onError(Call, Throwable), onExecuting(Call, StateChangedListener.ProgressData) and onSuccess(Call).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.magnet.android.mms.async.StateChangedListener

        StateChangedListener.ProgressData

      • onError

        public void onError(Call<?> call,
           Throwable cause)
        Callback when the call cannot be executed or encounters a failure. Typically the call state is FAILED. The caller must invoke Call.get() within a try-catch block to determine the cause.
        Specified by:
        onError in interface StateChangedListener
        Parameters:
        call - The asynchronous call.
        cause - The cause of the failure.
